amendment.description: Amendment ensures that the relationship between renewable energy development and water resources is established as a priority for Federal water planning, research and development.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 111-82 to require that the plan's analysis of the energy required to provide reliable water supplies and the water required for the production of alternative and renewable energy resources.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Teague amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 423 - 1 (Roll no. 201).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Teague amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 423 - 1 (Roll no. 201).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Teague.
